# mot-Comp
Motivationational Component

### Installing

1. Install libsensors4

```bash
	$ sudo apt-get install libsensors4-dev
```

2. Clone this repository and install it

```bash
	$ roscd
	$ cd ../src
	$ git clone https://github.com/ros-drivers/linux_peripheral_interfaces.git
	$ cd ..
	$ catkin_make
```
